You find yourself on a dusty road in rural India, surrounded by lush green fields and towering palm trees. In the distance, you can hear the faint sounds of drums and laughter. You follow the noise and come upon a colorful village celebration. As you approach, you see a group of dancers twirling gracefully to the music, their vibrant costumes sparkling in the sunlight. Suddenly, a commotion breaks out as a group of bandits on horseback ride into the village, brandishing swords and shouting threats. The villagers scatter in fear, and you realize that they need your help.

1. Rush to aid the villagers
2. Hide and observe the bandits
3. Try to negotiate with the bandits
4. Run away from the scene
